    • Constructor Detail

      • UDPAdapter

        public UDPAdapter(com.icodici.crypto.PrivateKey ownPrivateKey,
                  com.icodici.crypto.SymmetricKey sessionKey,
                  NodeInfo myNodeInfo)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Create an instance that listens for the incoming datagrams using the specified configurations. The adapter should start serving incoming datagrams immediately upon creation.
        Parameters:
        ownPrivateKey - is PrivateKey for signing requests
        sessionKey - is SymmetricKey with session
        myNodeInfo - is NodeInfo object described node this UDPAdapter work with
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong
